name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
description: A scroll that relocates you to your clan hall. If you don't have a clan hall, it will relocate you to the nearest village

name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
description: A scroll that relocates you to your castle. If you don't have a castle, it will relocate you to the nearest village

name: Antidote
description: A reagent that neutralizes poison

name: Greater Antidote
description: A high-quality reagent that neutralizes powerful poison

name: Bandage
description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding when injured

name: Emergency Dressing
description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding fast when severely injured

name: Soulshot: No Grade
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No grade weapon

name: Kendell's 1st Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Uoph. He should be somewhere around the ruins over the hill, west of the Elven Village

name: Kendell's 2nd Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kracha. He should be somewhere around the Nine obelisk, southwest of the Elven Village

name: Kendell's 3rd Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Batoh. He should be somewhere around the entrance of the underground fortress of the Elves

name: Kendell's 4th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Tanukia. He should be somewhere around the open-air theatre ruins, southwest of the Elven Village

name: Kendell's 5th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Turel. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, northwest of Lake Iris

name: Kendell's 6th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Roko. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, west of Lake Iris

name: Kendell's 7th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kamut. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, south of Lake Iris

name: Kendell's 8th Order
description: Punish Kaboo Chief Murtika. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, east of Lake Iris

name: Kaboo Chief's 1st Torque
description: A necklace taken by killing the chief of Kaboo orcs. Take this to Sentinel Kendell

name: Kaboo Chief's 2nd Torque
description: A necklace taken by killing the chief of Kaboo orcs. Take this to Sentinel Kendell

name: Turek Dog Tag
description: A military identification necklace of Turek orc fighters. Collect these and take them to Piotur for a reward

name: Turek Medallion
description: A military identification necklace of Turek orc officers. Collect these and take them to Piotur for a reward

name: Clay Urn Fragment
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A piece of a broken clay urn

name: Brass Trinket Piece
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A part of a brass trinket

name: Bronze Mirror Piece
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A part of a bronze mirror

name: Jade Necklace Bead
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A part of a jade necklace

name: Ancient Clay Urn
description: A clay urn of the Elmoreden empire

name: Ancient Brass Tiara
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A formal brass tiara

name: Ancient Bronze Mirror
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A bronze mirror

name: Ancient Jade Necklace
description: A relic of the Elmoreden empire. A jade necklace

name: Amulet: Chant of Life
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Life spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Keltir Fang
description: A fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any of the Masters

name: Keltir Fang
description: A fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any of the Magisters

name: Keltir Fang
description: A fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any Mother Tree Guardian

name: Keltir Fang
description: A fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to any Abyssal Celebrant

name: Keltir Fang
description: A fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to the Priest of fire

name: Keltir Fang
description: A fang taken by killing keltirs. Collect 4 and take them to the Miner
